resources.string: This app helps you calculate loan interest quickly and accurately

Monthly Interest:Rp %1$s 
 Total Interest :Rp %2$s 
 Total Payment :Rp %3$s 
 Payment Duration:Rp %4$s months

Bill Pay is an application designed to calculate fixed interest (flat rate). Fixed interest is a type of loan interest where the monthly amount remains constant and does not change throughout the loan period.

 Formula Used:
 Monthly Interest = Loan × (Interest / 100)
 Total Interest = Monthly Interest × Duration
 Total Debt = Loan + Total Interest

 This application was developed for Assessment 1 of Mobile Programming.
